price: Dan tidak ada sesuatu pun, melainkan pada sisi Kami-lah khazanahnya 795 dan Kami tidak menurunkannya, melainkan dengan ukuran yang tertentu.
arabic: وَإِن مِّن شَيۡءٍ إِلَّا عِندَنَا خَزَآئِنُهُۥ وَمَا نُنَزِّلُهُۥٓ إِلَّا بِقَدَرٖ مَّعۡلُومٖ
footnotes: 795.  Maksudnya, segala sesuatu itu sumbernya dari Allah Subḥānahu wa Ta‘ālā.

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-in min shayin illā ʿindanā khazāinuhu wamā nunazziluhu illā biqadarin maʿlūmin
